channel.title: Need moderator or admin help
channel.description:
Hi, I was just wondering if any Mod or Admin on these forums can remove my server from the status page. Because when I try to update the text somehow my password is incorrect. And, I cant change anything. I need this changed because I have made new additions to my server, and I will write down the password this time... I will RE-ADVERTISE but I assure you this will not happen again. Thanks for your time and I am very sorry if I have wasted it.
Thanks, GAILORD.
